00010 #include <GainConstants.hh>

00012 using namespace lcio;
00013 
00014 namespace CALICE {
00015 
00016 class TempGainConstants;
00017 
00023 class TempGainConstants: public GainConstants {
00024 
00025 private:
00026   float cellTemp, cellTempError, corrGain, corrGainError;
00027 
00028 public:
00029   
00032   TempGainConstants() {};
00033   
00044   TempGainConstants(unsigned chip, unsigned channel, float value, float error,
00045                     float gainTemp, float gainTempError, float Tslope, float TslopeError):
00046         GainConstants(chip,channel,value,error) {
00047     obj()->setFloatVal(2, gainTemp);
00048     obj()->setFloatVal(3, gainTempError);
00049     obj()->setFloatVal(4, Tslope);
00050     obj()->setFloatVal(5, TslopeError);
00051     cellTemp=0.;
00052     cellTempError=0.;
00053     corrGain=0.;
00054     corrGainError=0.;
00055   };
00056   
00057   TempGainConstants(LCObject* obj): GainConstants(obj) {};
00058   
00059   virtual ~TempGainConstants() {};
00060 
00063   void setCellTemp(float tempValue, float tempError) {
00064     cellTemp=tempValue;
00065     cellTempError=tempError;
00066 
00067     corrGain=getGainValue()+(cellTemp-getGainTemp())*getTslope();
00068     corrGainError=sqrt(pow(getTslope()*cellTempError,2)+pow(getTslope()*getGainTempError(),2)+
00069                        pow(getGainError(),2)+pow((cellTemp-getGainTemp())*getTslopeError(),2));
00070     return;
00071   }
00072 
00075   float getCorrGain() const {
00076     return corrGain;
00077   };  
00078 
00081   float getCorrGainError() const {
00082     return corrGainError;
00083   };  
00084 
00087   float getCellTemp() const {
00088     return cellTemp;
00089   };  
00090 
00093   float getCellTempError() const {
00094     return cellTempError;
00095   };  
00096 
00099   void setGainTemp(float value, float error) {
00100     obj()->setFloatVal(2, value);
00101     obj()->setFloatVal(3, error);
00102     return;
00103   }
00104 
00107   float getGainTemp() const {
00108     return getFloatVal(2);
00109   };  
00110 
00113   float getGainTempError() const {
00114     return getFloatVal(3);
00115   };  
00116 
00119   void setTslope(float value, float error) {
00120     obj()->setFloatVal(4, value);
00121     obj()->setFloatVal(5, error);
00122     return;
00123   };  
00124 
00127   float getTslope() const {
00128     return getFloatVal(4);
00129   };  
00130 
00133   float getTslopeError() const {
00134     return getFloatVal(5);
00135   };  
00136 
00141   float applyCalibration(float inputValue) const {
00142     return inputValue/corrGain;
00143   };
00144   
00147   float cancelCalibration(float outputValue) const {
00148     return outputValue*corrGain;
00149   };  
00150 
00156   float applyCalibrationError(float inputValue, float inputError) const {
00157     return (float) (sqrt(pow(inputError/inputValue,2)+pow(corrGainError/corrGain,2))*applyCalibration(inputValue));
00158 
00159   };
00160 
00163   float cancelCalibrationError(float outputValue, float outputError) const {
00164     return (float) (outputValue * corrGainError + corrGain * outputError);
00165   };      
00166 
00167 
00168   bool calibrationValid() const {
00169     return (GainConstants::calibrationValid() && (corrGain>0));
00170   };
00171 
00174   void print (std::ostream& os);
00175 
00178   const std::string getTypeName() const {
00179     return "TempGainConstants";
00180   };
00181 
00184   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00185     return "i:CellKey,f:GainValue,f:GainError,f:gainTemp,f:gainTempError,f:Tslope,f:TslopeError";
00186   };
00187 
00188       
00189 };
